article_metadata.description: The Supreme Court has ruled that low- and middle-income residents in the 34 states without health-care exchanges can continue to receive federal tax credits.

og.description: The Supreme Court has ruled that low- and middle-income residents in the 34 states without health-care exchanges can continue to receive federal tax credits.
og.title: Upholding affordable health care
